This is the complete live coverage of 
Day 1. Every single hand and aired 
on a 30 minute delay with holecards.

Split the massive thing up in natural
parts for both encoding and viewing
purposes. Sync is always an issue with
massive files and if you dont like it,
nuke it if you want. I'm sure the fans
of poker will be able to find it anyway. 

The READNFO issue:
A drop in Part5 cause a few seconds to be
missing in one hand. Out of close to 11h
that feels minor on a live event. 

The worse part is that Day2 had over 10min
of distorted picture just at the final hands
of the heads up. It's too bad even for an
internal. With some luck those hands will 
be in some later rerun of an edited version
like they've done previous years since it
is key hands. If that happen we will pre it
later.
This is the best final table in years so a
proper version would be fun to have
